vlive.korean: 그렇죠 은퇴하면 안 되죠. Yes, you don't want to retire. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]스케치 X 앞터V (Sketch X Early Interview)
vlive.english: Yes, you don't want to retire.

vlive.korean: 멜로 군들 나의 마지막 은퇴 무대를 함께 해 주겠나? Mallows, will you join for my retirement performance? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] IU 10th Anniv. Tour Concert 'dlwlrma. (이 지금)' - Seoul
vlive.english: Mallows, will you join for my retirement performance?

vlive.korean: [감상 포인트 7] [체력 고갈로 감독 은퇴 사태...] 아 다리 아퍼. [Focus point 7] [Director is about to retire...] My legs hurt. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : Ep.05 무엘이의 예능 본능
vlive.english: [Focus point 7] [Director is about to retire...] My legs hurt.

vlive.korean: 행시 은퇴하시고. OK, you won't. 듣기 View video WINNER : Guess who`s back ?
경아 근데 은퇴는... And you have one more... 듣기 View video Block B : ZICO Preview

examples.korean: At 71, he has now retired from the political fray. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 71세인 그는 이제 정쟁에서 은퇴했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At 71, he has now retired from the political fray. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He has already intimated (that) he intends to retire. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 이미 은퇴할 거라는 뜻을 시사했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has already intimated (that) he intends to retire. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The horse was retired from racing and put out to stud. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 말은 경주에서 은퇴하고 종마가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The horse was retired from racing and put out to stud. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was determined to have one last fling before retiring. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 은퇴하기 전에 마지막으로 한바탕 실컷 즐기기로 작정을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was determined to have one last fling before retiring. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Dad is retired now. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 아빠는 이제 은퇴하셨어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
